system.description: You create a nonliving plant or mineral object. The volume cannot exceed 1 cubic foot per caster level. The object must be of a form and material you have seen before. Duration depends on the material: cloth, rope, or similar 1 hour/level; wood or bone 1 hour/level; stone, metal, or other mineral 1 min./level.

components.materialDescription: A tiny piece of matter of the same sort of item you plan to create.

system.target: Unattended, nonmagical object of nonliving plant or mineral matter, up to 1 cu. ft./level
